title: How many hours a day do novelists write? - Quora

response.answer_text: Being totally honest, If I write at least 4 hours per day or more, I can finish an entire book in 7 days consisting of at least 300 pages .. I find it very effortlessly to be able to do that.. Regards, Author Dia Stone

Hello, Many famous novelists have their own writing schedule and writing spot. Some write for 4 hours daily early in the morning, some complete 3000 words after their day job in the night. So, it just really depends on you how much can you do. It also depends on your commitment and time slots you have. Hope this helps!
